oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rice Carothers
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Performing Identity
Artists
African American artists
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Chattanooga Times Image of Rice Carothers.
Rice Carothers was born in Chattanooga and went on to study art in New York City in the 1930s. He served in World War II, and died in Chattanooga in 1997. He is buried at Forest Hills Cemetery.
